title: Meesho
description: An E-commerce application which has seamless E-commerce flow, Authentication, Authorization with Protected Routes.

title: Learndemy
description: MERN app which is clone of Udemy has seamless E-commerce flow, Authentication, Authorization with Protected Routes.

title: Taskee
description: MERN app with categorization, prioritization, CRUD operations, and advanced filtering.

title: Brewopedia
description: Web app that fetches and displays a list of brewinfo from the Openbrewerydb. The app supports pagination, search brewlist and allows users to customize the number of brewlist displayed per page.

title: Trackiii
description: Job tracking app featuring drag-and-drop, job creation, editing, and detailed viewing.

title: Tic Tac Toe Legends
description: Classic Tic Tac Toe game using React. The game allows two players to take turns marking the spaces in a 3x3 grid. The first player to align three of their marks in a row, column, or diagonal wins the game.

title: Dice Dash
description: Dice Dash Game, a web application that allows you to roll a virtual six-sided die. This application provides an interactive and immersive experience, complete with a realistic thrown animation.

title: RPS Royale
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors Royale is a simple web-based game where you can play the classic Rock, Paper, Scissors game against the computer.

title: Dashboard
description: Dashboard UI Implementaion with React and CSS.

title: Rick Morty Encyclopedia
description: Rick Morty Encyclopedia built with Rick Morty API which has pagination and search feature
